statements: SELECT * FROM employee_recognition WHERE id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, reward_name FROM employee_recognition WHERE date_given > '2022-01-01';
SELECT reward_name, reward_description FROM employee_recognition WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM employee_recognition WHERE reward_name LIKE '%bonus%';
SELECT id, reward_name, date_given FROM employee_recognition ORDER BY date_given DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_recognition WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY date_given ASC;
SELECT id, reward_name FROM employee_recognition WHERE reward_name LIKE '%bonus%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_rewards FROM employee_recognition GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_rewards > 3;
SELECT * FROM employee_recognition WHERE date_given BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, reward_name, date_given FROM employee_recognition WHERE employee_id IN (102, 103, 104) ORDER BY date_given DESC;
SELECT * FROM organization WHERE organization_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT organization_name FROM organization ORDER BY organization_name DESC;
SELECT organization_id, organization_name FROM organization WHERE organization_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM employee_rewards ORDER BY reward_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, reward_amount FROM employee_rewards WHERE reward_amount > 1000.00;
SELECT * FROM organization WHERE organization_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT * FROM organization ORDER BY organization_id DESC;
SELECT organization_id, organization_name FROM organization WHERE organization_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employee_rewards WHERE reward_amount > 1000);
SELECT organization_id, organization_name, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM organization GROUP BY organization_id, organization_name HAVING total_employees > 5;

SELECT organization_id, organization_name, SUM(reward_amount) AS total_rewards FROM organization INNER JOIN employee_rewards ON organization.organization_id = employee_rewards.employee_id GROUP BY organization_id, organization_name ORDER BY total_rewards DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Employee WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT reward_name, amount, type FROM Reward WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT recognition_id, message, date FROM Recognition ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT * FROM Reward WHERE type = 'Bonus';
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT recognition_id, message, date FROM Recognition ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, reward_name, amount FROM Reward WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department='Sales';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, reward_name FROM employees JOIN recognition ON employees.employee_id = recognition.employee_id JOIN rewards ON recognition.reward_id = rewards.reward_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department='Finance' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;

SELECT employee_name, reward_name, recognition_date FROM employees INNER JOIN recognition ON employees.employee_id = recognition.employee_id INNER JOIN rewards ON recognition.reward_id = rewards.reward_id WHERE recognition_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT department_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM employees INNER JOIN departments ON employees.department = departments.department_name GROUP BY department_name;

SELECT department_name, SUM(reward_points) AS total_points FROM rewards INNER JOIN recognition ON rewards.reward_id = recognition.reward_id INNER JOIN employees ON recognition.employee_id = employees.employee_id INNER JOIN departments ON employees.department = departments.department_name GROUP BY department_name ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM Rewards WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT recognition_id, message FROM Recognition WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT department_name FROM Departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01' AND hire_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM Employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY hire_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Recognition WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND receiver_id = '987e6543-cb1a-4ea8-9355-22b50aacceb1' ORDER BY recognition_date DESC;

SELECT department_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS employee_count FROM Departments LEFT JOIN Employees ON Departments.department_id = Employees.department GROUP BY department_name HAVING employee_count > 5;
